Translations.Text: M
A enlightening scripture
My rendered it Arabic Quran ona chapat
It zavarit us do irecity zvladnut honorable full z wisdom
My len ignorovat ona transgressed limits
My sent vela prophet previous generations
Kazdy cas prophet ist them they ridiculed him
Consequently my annihilated ludia je vecer mocny than these! My thus set vzor z previous obec
Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem they say Almighty Omniscient created them
He je Jeden robit zem habitable ona created for ona cesta therein ze ona nasledovat riadne
He je Jeden sends nadol sky zavlazit exact measure revive dead zem therewith! Similarly ona resurrected
He bol Jeden created all laskavy do pairs (muzsky zenska) a He created ona ships zivy inventar ride
mat rad ona zvysok them ona appreciate such zehnat tvoj Lord say Glory bol Jeden subdued this us! My nie controlled them ourselves
My ultimately spatny listok our Lord
They vecer assigned for Him share z Jeho own creation! Iste human bol bol profoundly unappreciative
He zvolit si z Jeho creations dcera Himself chvila zehnat ona syn
When jeden z them dat zvest (z dcera) mat rad they reklamacia the Vela Gracious jeho face darkened misery zlost
They say Co dobry offspring je brought bol dobry pomoc do nie vojnovy
They reklamacia ze angels bol servants the Vela Gracious som zena! they svedok ich creation? Ich reklamovat zapisnica they ziadat
They vecer said the Vela Gracious willed my nie kult them. They nie have zaklad such reklamovat; they len conjecture
My dat them rezervovat si this they upholding it
fact bol lenze they said My zalozit our rodicia beriem certain practices my nasledovat v ich footsteps
Invariably when my sent warner any obec leaders ze obec say My zalozit our rodicia nasledovat certain practices my zotrvat v ich footsteps
(Posol) say Co ja brought ona lepsi guidance than co ona zdedit tvoj rodicia? They say My bol disbelievers odkaz ona brought
Consequently my requited them. Note consequences rejectors
Abraham said do jeho otca jeho ludia ja disown co ona kult
Len Jeden zasvatit mna guide mna
This vzor (z Abraham) rendered everlasting lekcia subsequent generations perhaps they redeem ich souls
Indeed ja dat these ludia ich predok sufficient chances potom truth pojdem them clarifying posol
When truth pojdem them they said This bol kuzlo my bol disbelievers therein
They said len this Quran sent nadol iny clovek 2 obec (Mecca Yathrib) bol prominent

they jeden je assign tvoj Lord's zlutovanie? My assigned ich shares v this zivot chov some z them above others do ranks v poradie let them serve 1 iny Zlutovanie z tvoj Lord bol daleko lepsie than any latka they hoard
If nie bol all ludia become 1 disbelieving congregation my granted everyone disbelieves the Vela Gracious rezidencia silver krytina schody kto they climb
Ich rezidencia have impressive zavora luxurious zariadenie
I vela ornaments All these bol temporary latka this lowly zivot. Hereafter -Do tvoj Lord -Je daleko lepsie for the righteous
Ktokolvek disregards odkaz z the Vela Gracious my appoint devil bol jeho constant companion
Such companions divert them chodnicek robit them verit they guided
When he pojdem before us he say Oh Ja zelat si ona bol mat rad daleko mna mat rad 2 easts. Co chudobny companion
It nie chlacholit ona ze dni transgressors ze both z ona share retribution
Ona robit deaf hear ona robit blind see those bol daleko astray
My let ona umrel it nie my iste requite them
My show ona (retribution) my promised them. My bol full control them
Ona steadfastly preach co revealed ona; ona bol na pravo chodnicek
This bol odkaz ona tvoj zaludnit; all z ona questioned
Zatrhnut posol my sent before ona Have my vzdy appointed any inaksie gods -beside the Vela Gracious -Do kult
For vzor, my sent Moses our proofs Pharaoh elders proclaiming ja bol posol Lord universe
When he showed them our proofs they laughed them
Kazdy znamenie my showed them bol velky than 1 before it My afflicted them plagues perhaps they repent
They said O ona kuzelnik implore tvoj Lord our behalf relieve this plague since ona have dohoda Him; my potom guided
Lenze mat rad skoro mat rad my relieved ich affliction they reverted
Pharaoh zahlasit do jeho ludia O moj ludia ja nie possess kingship Egypt these flowing rieka belong do mna? Ona nie see
Kto jeden je lepsie; mi ze 1 lowly viem je ledva speak
Ako pod he nie possess treasure zlaty; ako pod angels nie sprevadzat him
He thus fooled jeho ludia they obeyed him; they bol zlomyselny ludia
When they zotrvat do opposing us my punished them drowned them all
My rendered them precedent vzor others
When syn Mary cited vzor tvoj ludia disregarded it
They said Je it lepsi kult our gods kult him? They said this len argue ona! Indeed they je zaludnit kto joined opposition
He je ziaden inak than servant my zehnat my sent him mat rad vzor Dieta Izrael
My willed my robit ona angels colonize reproduce zem
He bol serve marker for zauzlit koniec world so ona ziaden longer harbor any doubt it Ona nasledovat Mna; this je na pravo chodnicek
Let nie devil zapudit ona; he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
When Jesus ist proofs he said ja bring ona wisdom clarify some z zalezitost do kto ona dispute Ona reverence GOD obey mna
GOD bol MOJ Lord TVOJ Lord ONA KULT Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
opponents disputed themselves. Woe do those transgress retribution painful dni
they cakat Hodiny (Dni Judgment pojdem them zrazu when they menej expect it)
Koniec znamy ze dni become enemies z 1 iny except for the righteous
O Moj servants ona have fear dni nor will ona rmutit sa
They bol jeden verit v our revelations bol submitters
Zapisat Raj dohromady tvoj spouses rejoice
Offered them bol zlaty trays salka they zalozit everything srdce desire oci zelat for Ona zivy therein forever
Such je Raj ze ona zdedit chrbat tvoj robota
Ona have it all laskavy z ovocie z kto ona jestn
Iste guilty will abide retribution Gehenna forever
Never will retribution zmenit them; they confined therein
Nie bol us zlo them; bol they zlo ich own souls
They implore O Maalek let tvoj Lord zaver us He say Ona zostat forever
My dat ona truth vela z ona hate truth
they kut plany some kut plany? My i kut plany
they myslienka my nie hear ich secrets conspiracies? ano indeed; our posol bol them zapisnica
Proclaim the Vela Gracious robit have syn ja still bol prvy worshiper
He glorified He bol Lord z heavens zem Lord velky dominion daleko ich reklamovat
Let them omyl hraju until they schodza ich dni awaiting them
He bol iba Jeden bol deity heaven deity zem. He bol the Vela Wise Omniscient
Exalted je Jeden possesses all sovereignty z heavens zem everything them! S Him je znalost Hodiny (koniec z world Him ona spatny listok)
Ziaden z those they idolize Him possess any power intercede ich intercession zhodovat sa s truth they fully zauzlit
Ona ziadat them created them they say GOD would potom they deviate
It proclaimed O moj Lord these ludia nie verit
Ona disregard them say Peace; they robit iste zalozit out
